fields.name: encouraging_email
fields.html_content:
{% extends "emails/base.html" %} {% block content %}

Hi!

We've noticed that you're still not using AddNow's cool sharing buttons.

We really want to help you build your audience and drive traffic to your site. So, come back to AddNow and customize sharing buttons that have the exact "look and feel" you want.

Use our simple, easy-to-follow instructions to get AddNow buttons posted and sharing content on your site. If you need help, or have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us directly at grvty.fr/Help.

Sincerely,

The AddNow Team

Note: If you no longer want to receive emails from us, unsubscribe from our mailing list using this link: {{base_url}}{{path}}{{token}}

{% endblock %}
fields.description: Encouraging email for when the user has not yeat created any widget
fields.content:
Hi!
We've noticed that you're still not using AddNow's cool sharing buttons.
We really want to help you build your audience and drive traffic to your site. So, come back to AddNow and customize sharing buttons that have the exact "look and feel" you want.
Use our simple, easy-to-follow instructions to get AddNow buttons posted and sharing content on your site. If you need help, or have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us directly at grvty.fr/Help.
Sincerely,
The AddNow Team
-----
Note: If you no longer want to receive emails from us, unsubscribe from our mailing list using this link: {{base_url}}{{path}}{{token}}
fields.subject: Create customizable ADDNOW buttons

fields.name: confirmation_email
fields.html_content:
{% extends "emails/base.html" %} {% block content %}

Hello,

Welcome to AddNow!

Please click this link to verify your email address.

If you are not able to click the verification link above or if the link does not work, please copy and paste the URL below directly into your browser.
{{ base_url }}{{ path }}{{ token }}


Sincerely,

The AddNow Team

{% endblock %}
fields.content:
Hello,

Welcome to AddNow!

Please click this link to verify your email address.

If you are not able to click the verification link above or if the link does not work, please copy and paste the URL below directly into your browser.
{{ base_url }}/confirm/{{ token }}


Sincerely,
The AddNow Team
fields.subject: Email verification on addnow.com

fields.name: password_reset
fields.html_content:
{% extends "emails/base.html" %} {% block content %}

Hi!

We've received a request to reset your password.

You can change your password by following this link

If you don't want to change your password, simply ignore this email and nothing will be changed.

If clicking on the verification link doesn't work, please copy and paste the entire URL into your browser's address bar and press Enter.
{{ base_url }}{{path}}{{ user.pk }}|{{ token }}

{% endblock %}
fields.subject: Password recovery on addnow.com

fields.name: trim_fail
fields.description: Template used for user notification about problems with trim service usage.
fields.content:
Hello,

Please check trim setup for site {{site}}. When connecting to tr.im we got this error: {{error}}.


Sincerely,
The AddNow Team
fields.subject: A problem with tr.im
